      • getSelectedFeaturesCount

        public int getSelectedFeaturesCount(MgLayerBase layer,
                                    java.lang.String className)
        Returns the number of selected features.
        Parameters:
        layer - (MgLayerBase) Input layer.
        className - (String/string) Input feature class name.
        Returns:
        Returns Count of all selected features.
        Since:
        2.0

      • getSelectedFeatures

        public MgFeatureReader getSelectedFeatures(MgLayerBase layer,
                                           java.lang.String className,
                                           boolean mappedOnly)
        Returns the selected feature data for the specified feature class.
        Parameters:
        layer - (MgLayerBase) Input layer.
        className - (String/string) Input feature class name.
        mappedOnly - (boolean/bool) Return mapped (true) or all (false) properties for selected features
        Returns:
        Returns a feature reader containing all the features for the given feature class in this selection.
        Since:
        2.0

      • getSelectedFeatures

        public MgFeatureReader getSelectedFeatures(MgLayerBase layer,
                                           java.lang.String className,
                                           MgStringCollection propertyNames)
        TODO: API Documentation is missing or failed to translate doxygen brief directive (message inserted by IMake.exe)
        Parameters:
        layer - (MgLayerBase) Input layer.
        className - (String/string) Input feature class name.
        propertyNames - (MgStringCollection) Properties to return for selected features.
        Returns:
        Returns a feature reader containing all the features for the given feature class in this selection.
        Since:
        2.0

      • fromXml

        public void fromXml(java.lang.String xmlSelectionString)
        Read selection from XML document. Previous selection is cleared.

      • toXml

        public java.lang.String toXml()
        Write selection as XML document. This document will typically be passed back to a viewer to select the desired features.

      • addFeatures

        public void addFeatures(MgLayerBase layer,
                        MgFeatureReader features,
                        int nFeatures)
        Add nFeatures to selection set from the FeatureReader. Specify nFeatures = 0 for all features in reader. Internal identity mapping for layer dictates the properties used

        Returns:

      • add

                java.lang.String className,

        Parameters:
        layer - (CREFSTRING) Name of layer
        className - (CREFSTRING) Name of feature class
        id - (CREFSTRING) Base 64 string encoded ID of the feature
